title: HoP 326 - Istanbul (Not Constantinople) - the Later Orthodox Tradition
itunes:title: HoP 326 - Istanbul (Not Constantinople) - the Later Orthodox Tradition
description: When the Byzantine empire ended in 1453, philosophy in Greek did not end with it. In this episode we bring the story up to the 20th century.
content:encoded: When the Byzantine empire ended in 1453, philosophy in Greek did not end with it. In this episode we bring the story up to the 20th century.
